thread.title: Great Location
thread.title_full: Great Location - Review of Hyatt Centric Times Square New York, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Mauresam
title: Great Location
text: We stayed overnight at the Hyatt Centric to enjoy a concert at Town Hall. We picked the hotel based on location. It was walking distance from Penn Station, Town Hall, Times Square, and a quick trip to Central Park. We were upgraded on arrival to a one-bedroom suite. It had a king bed and a sofa bed in the living room. Kind of disappointing that there was only one bathroom. The staff was prompt to our requests to get linen for the sofa bed and a problem we were having with the shower. We did not have anything to eat or drink at the hotel so I canâ€™t comment on the quality or the cost of food/liquor.
